briefdescription.para: get MIPI_DSI default config on video mode
transmit data using mipi dsi message in low power mode

simplesect.para: The number of bytes transmitted on success or a negative error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: specify the maximum size of the the payload in a long packet transmitted from the peripheral back to the host processor

parameterdescription.para: the maximum size of the payload

simplesect.para: : true on success or false on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (MIPI_DSI_Type *ptr, uint8_t channel, const void *payload, uint16_t size)
memberdef.name: mipi_dsi_generic_write

briefdescription.para: transmit data using a generic write packet

detaileddescription.para:
ptr
MIPI_DSI base address
channel
virtual channel
payload
buffer containing the payload
size
size of payload buffer
This function will automatically choose the right data type depending on the payload length.

simplesect.para: : The number of bytes transmitted on success or a negative error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (MIPI_DSI_Type *ptr, uint8_t channel, const void *params, uint16_t num_params, void *data, uint16_t size)
memberdef.name: mipi_dsi_generic_read

briefdescription.para: receive data using a generic read packet

detaileddescription.para:
ptr
MIPI_DSI base address
channel
virtual channel
params
buffer containing the request parameters
num_params
number of request parameters
data
buffer in which to return the received data
size
size of receive buffer
This function will automatically choose the right data type depending on the number of parameters passed in.

simplesect.para: : The number of bytes successfully read or a negative error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (MIPI_DSI_Type *ptr, uint8_t channel, const void *data, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: mipi_dsi_dcs_write_buffer

briefdescription.para: transmit a DCS command with payload

detaileddescription.para:
ptr
MIPI_DSI base address
channel
virtual channel
data
buffer containing data to be transmitted
len
size of transmission buffer
This function will automatically choose the right data type depending on the command payload length.

simplesect.para: : The number of bytes successfully transmitted or a negative error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (MIPI_DSI_Type *ptr, uint8_t channel, uint8_t cmd, const void *data, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: mipi_dsi_dcs_write

detaileddescription.para:
ptr
MIPI_DSI base address
channel
virtual channel
cmd
DCS command
data
buffer containing the command payload
len
command payload length
This function will automatically choose the right data type depending on the command payload length.

simplesect.para: : The number of bytes successfully transmitted or a negative error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (MIPI_DSI_Type *ptr, uint8_t channel, uint8_t cmd, void *data, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: mipi_dsi_dcs_read

parameterdescription.para: buffer in which to receive data

simplesect.para: : The number of bytes read or a negative error code on failure.
